properties.description: The `type` of column, which decides how table cells are rendered.
properties.detail: By default the column renders readonly text.
properties.name: type

properties.description:
If the `type` is `Custom`, this function will be used for renderering
table cells under the column.
properties.detail: The function will be called with `onDraw(painter, rect, value)`.
properties.name: onDraw

properties.description: Which `column` of table model to show.
properties.detail: By default the index of table's newly-added column will be used.
properties.name: column

properties.detail:
Using -1 will use auto-size. By default -1 is used.

On Linux setting the width of last column does not work, it always resizes
to fill the space. It is recommended to use -1 for last column to have
consistent behavior between platforms.
properties.name: width
